channel.title: [NEW] OleanPkz 24/7 RSPS [Sponsorship coming!]
channel.description:
[center]
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img] [url=http://oleanpkz.uphero.com/]Webclient[/url] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img] [url=http://oleanpkz.uphero.com/]Forum[/url] [img]http://betascape.info/nav-img/controller_add.png[/img] [url=http://oleanpkz.uphero.com/]Download Client[/url]
[b]Introduction:[/b] OleanPkz© [url=http://www.OleanPkz.com]OleanPkz Forum[/url] Owned and created by Creator Jkas
Coming soon (Hopefully about 3 more days.):
- Vote4Points System - High Scores - Webclient Update
[/center]
[left] Welcome to private server: OleanPkz. We are a 317 DELTA (Yes DELTA, not PI.) player-killing, and skilling server. We specialize in PKing with our custom built player killing system. (View the custom PK system [url=http://oleanpkz.uphero.com/showthread.php?tid=4]here[/url].) We offer over 15 trainable skills and have over 10 bosses, and 7 minigames! You can suggest anything you'd like to see on the forum, or the server by typing ::suggest (In-server.) or by posting your suggestion in the suggestion thread [url=http://oleanpkz.uphero.com/forumdisplay.php?fid=12]here[/url][/align]. Suggestions are [u]always[/u] welcome and are read daily by the OleanPkz Management Team. We offer an auto-donation system, as well as a Vote4Point system. (You can view the donation section here, or the Vote4Points system here.)
We are looking for members to add to our Management or Development Team. (View management thread here.)
[/left] [center][size=18pt]Pictures/Media:[/size][/center]
[size=12pt]From the beginning...[/size]
Creating a new account. [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/5amkpt.png[/img]
Accepting the rules. [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/w0gd5e.png[/img]
How to start. (You can type ::skip to skip tutorial island!) [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/29cqs1y.png[/img]
If you finish tutorial island, you get to choose a starter package! [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2vxk21v.png[/img]
Welcome screen. [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/28ip6qv.png[/img]
Teleport List [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/24edu0j.png[/img]
Donator Panel [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2vcz6gi.png[/img]
Super Donator Panel [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/11tml40.png[/img]
Online Point Shop [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/ddg6s2.png[/img]
PK Point Shop [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/mw8ef4.png[/img]
Trial of Judgement Minigame [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/24gopll.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/23uyal4.png[/img]
All Godwars Bosses [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2w7lbit.png[/img]
Tormented Demons [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2m2yr01.png[/img]
Assigned Tasks (With rewards!) [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2n9g5zt.png[/img]
More to come..

item.title: [NEW] OleanPkz 24/7 RSPS [Sponsorship coming!]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Nice job! Looks actually, developed :O. Better than the about 95% server leech virus ;).

Read full topic

item.title: [NEW] OleanPkz 24/7 RSPS [Sponsorship coming!]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

check out my thread on general rsps discussion board and also tyb97 or however you spell his name ( tyler ) has a thread on there where I gave a couple of ideas

Read full topic

item.title: [NEW] OleanPkz 24/7 RSPS [Sponsorship coming!]
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

Well I’ve added a custom PK System which basically gives you more Pk Points as your Kill Streak advances.

Also, made a few custom areas.

What else would you consider unique?
I’m always open for input.

We have a ::suggest command in-game and I view all suggestions daily!

Read full topic

item.title: [NEW] OleanPkz 24/7 RSPS [Sponsorship coming!]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:10, topic:454304”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=557175.msg4079113#msg4079113 date=1345173418]
Just liked all the new interfaces, nothing else appealed.
[/quote]
Same Lol…[/quote]^ this

I love the interfaces but nothing else is appealing. You haven’t really shown anything else “unique”

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX

item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX

@JGX wrote:

Thank you. I will eventually add more pictures and information when I get time.

item.title: [NEW] OleanPkz 24/7 RSPS [Sponsorship coming!]
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

Well yes kind of. I felt as if the interfaces were the easiest way for new players to RSPS or even RuneScape. I have about 50 players from my area who are about 8-12 and they are new so it’s good for them. There is a lot more interfaces tbh lol. I haven’t got the time to add all of the information.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:

Just look’s like a lot of interface’s. Maybe im wrong.

item.title: [NEW] OleanPkz 24/7 RSPS [Sponsorship coming!]
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

[quote=“JGX, post:3, topic:454304”]Thank you. Yes everything all the images were created by myself.

This is a czar base built from the ground up. Turned out pretty nice. Looking forward to RS and MPS Sponsorship within the week![/quote]

Nice, if you are only going for one go for MPS. You’ll get the best results.

Read full topic

item.title: [NEW] OleanPkz 24/7 RSPS [Sponsorship coming!]
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

This is a czar base built from the ground up. Turned out pretty nice. Looking forward to RS and MPS Sponsorship within the week!
